name: God doesn't play dice
description:
Play as either God or the Devil to take control of the world. Cast spells and try to keep the world's population in control; Because the goal is to keep the balance.  

Change your character by clicking the right or left bottom screen and depending on where you throw the dice, the ability will be more or less effective.

A God Sim combined with a bit of unpredictability, can you keep the balance?

Controls

  • Drag hand to throw dice
  • Press on the clouds at the bottom to switch character
